value_claims.claim_title: Reduced concept creation time from weeks to days
value_claims.claim_description: L'Oréal Groupe's marketing teams reduced the time required to create initial marketing concepts and product visualizations from weeks to days using CREAITECH with Imagen 3 and Veo 2.
value_claims.source_quote: L'Oréal Groupe's marketing teams have reduced the amount of time it takes to create initial concepts from weeks to days.
value_claims.quote_location: Mid-document, section 'Faster concepts and lower costs'
value_claims.attribution_evidence: The time reduction is explicitly attributed to using gen AI technology (Imagen 3, Veo 2) within CREAITECH platform for concept generation.

value_claims.claim_title: Accelerated video asset production with Veo 2
value_claims.claim_description: Teams use Veo 2 to convert static images into eight-second animated sequences, dramatically accelerating the production of engaging video marketing assets.
value_claims.source_quote: Teams are now using Veo to bring their static images to life as stunning, eight-second animated sequences — dramatically accelerating the production of engaging video assets.
value_claims.quote_location: Early section, 'Imagen 3 and Veo 2 simplifies marketing production'
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Video production acceleration is directly attributed to using Veo 2 model to animate static images into video sequences.

value_claims.claim_title: Cost reduction through efficient asset creation
value_claims.claim_description: Gen AI tools cut costs and create efficiencies in creating marketing assets for tens of thousands of product items, nearly half of which change annually.
value_claims.source_quote: Third, it cuts down on cost and creates new efficiencies, given the number of assets that are created. L'Oréal Groupe has tens of thousands of items across its brands, and nearly half of them change annually.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Cost reduction is directly attributed to using gen AI tools for creating and iterating product packaging concepts versus traditional methods like 3D printing.

value_claims.claim_title: Faster market localization of product campaigns
value_claims.claim_description: Teams can quickly adapt product shots for different markets by generating localized backgrounds and settings while maintaining brand consistency.
value_claims.source_quote: We can take the same product shot and seamlessly place it in a Japanese garden, on a bustling Parisian street, or any other relevant setting, ensuring the visual resonates with the local audience while staying true to the brand.
value_claims.quote_location: Quote from Antoine Castex in section about Imagen 3 and Veo 2
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Market localization capability is directly enabled by gen AI's ability to generate contextually appropriate backgrounds for existing product shots.

value_claims.claim_title: Enhanced creative autonomy for marketing teams
value_claims.claim_description: Marketing employees can now independently conceptualize and visualize their creative visions without relying on external resources to bring ideas to life.
value_claims.source_quote: L'Oréal Groupe employees can now unleash their own creative potential without relying on someone else to conceptualize their vision.
value_claims.quote_location: Section 'Faster concepts and lower costs', first benefit listed
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Creative autonomy is directly enabled by gen AI tools that allow employees to generate visuals from prompts without external dependencies.

value_claims.claim_description: Gen AI tools reduced turnaround times compared to traditional agency workflows involving requests, proposals, and multiple revision cycles.
value_claims.source_quote: the tool has helped teams deliver quicker turnaround times compared to the traditional ways of working with agencies, where requests, idea proposals, and revisions often prolong the creation of marketing campaigns and product concepts.
value_claims.quote_location: Section 'Faster concepts and lower costs', second benefit
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Turnaround time improvement is directly attributed to using gen AI tools versus traditional agency collaboration processes.

value_claims.claim_description: Gen AI enables efficient exploration and iteration of packaging design concepts (caps, colors, lighting, sizing) more cost-effectively than 3D printing.
value_claims.source_quote: Integrating AI into this process allows its product teams to explore and iterate various packing design concepts more efficiently and cost-effectively compared to 3D printing.
value_claims.quote_location: Section 'Faster concepts and lower costs', packaging example
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Efficiency and cost-effectiveness improvements are directly attributed to using gen AI for packaging visualization versus physical 3D printing.

value_claims.claim_title: Scaled brand-compliant content creation across 37 brands
value_claims.claim_description: CREAITECH enables L'Oréal to scale creation of brand-compliant and localized content across its 37 beauty brands while upskilling marketers.
value_claims.source_quote: CREAITECH allows L'Oréal to scale the creation of brand-compliant and localized content across its 37 beauty brands, and in parallel, upskill L'Oréal marketers on the latest creative technologies.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Content scaling capability is directly attributed to CREAITECH gen AI platform enabling brand-compliant content generation at scale.

value_claims.claim_description: Brand Custom Models trained on unique brand visual codes enable faster launch of innovative beauty campaigns while maintaining responsible AI principles.
value_claims.source_quote: With our new Brand Custom Models, we can train GenAI to recognize the unique visual codes of our brands and launch innovative beauty campaigns faster.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Campaign launch speed improvement is directly attributed to Brand Custom Models that recognize brand-specific visual codes.

value_claims.claim_title: Generation of thousands of unique on-brand assets
value_claims.claim_description: CreAltech empowers marketers to generate thousands of unique, on-brand images, texts, and videos for diverse platforms and global audiences.
value_claims.source_quote: CreAltech empowers marketers to generate thousands of unique, on-brand images, texts, and videos for diverse platforms and global audiences.
value_claims.quote_location: New Frontiers of Creativity & Culture section
value_claims.attribution_evidence: The ability to generate thousands of assets is directly attributed to CreAltech gen AI platform capabilities.
